creator: kuriyama@s2factory.co.jp
text:
In the source mod_include.c, "SSILegacyExprParser" is defined as OR_LIMIT.  But not documented as "Override: Limit".

I'm not sure this directive was written actually for OR_LIMIT override, because it seems not suitable for "AllowOverride Limit" context.  Maybe OR_ALL suitable?

(I found SSILastModified and SSIEtag also marked as OR_LIMIT ...)
